Discrete Mathematics and Logic

Hello everyone, in this page I will tell you about my experience with Discrete Mathematics and Logic, two braches of Math that I really enjoy.

About lab 7

Sun 22/03/15 11:30

In this lab they ask me to prove or disprove some propositions about sets, let's look at them:

The first two are easy, not too complicated, but the thing is, I do not know how to wirte such things formally. I hope that the Teacher Assistant who will grade this assigment has a good heart.

Sun 22/03/15 12:32

Ok, I'm finished with the set proofs. Now I'm going to the relations part. It took me 10 minutes figure out the proofs. The rest of the time I was trasncribing the proof from my notebook to the word processor. I ned to learn LaTex , it seems pretty cool!

The relations and functions in the assignment were really easy. Again, it took me more to write them than to find them. I hate that waste of time. Is LaTex eficcient?
